H0.text: what is the time setting of game of thrones. Ancient

H1.text: what is the time setting of game of thrones. Renaissance

H2.text: what is the time setting of game of thrones. Dark Ages

H3.text: what is the time setting of game of thrones. medieval

A4.text: Most of Westeros is reminiscent of high medieval Europe, from its geography and castles to its cultures, the feudal system, palace intrigues, and the knights' tournaments.

A5.text: Like medieval Europe, most of the houses in the series use the patriarchal system of power.
